text: Isiyan diza laapun woossa keethatas, Kaseka dizayssafe, ha7ika dizayssapene, buroka yaana Xoossafe iza aliga sinthan diza laapun ayanatape hessathoka hayqofe denthan bayra gididayssafe, ha biitta kawotas kawone ammanettida marika gididayssafe, nuna siiqizayssafene ba suunthan nuna nu nagarape geeshida Yesus kiristoosape kiyatethine, saroteth, intes gido.
